name: webpack-base-project

scripts.build: webpack -p && npm run copyImages && npm run copyFonts && npm run copyPdf

readme:
# frontend - webpack build system #

##scaricare zip ed estrarre##

* [download zip](https://bitbucket.org/purplenetwork/frontend-webpack-build/downloads)

##installare tramite npm##

* npm install bitbucket:purplenetwork/frontend-webpack-build.git

##setup e configurazione##

* modificare file .gitignore nella root

* dalla linea di comando eseguire npm run setup

```
#!javascript

npm run setup

```

* rispondere alle domande per genereare i file di configurazione dell'app

###verranno modificati i file scss:###
* dev/styles/config/config-dev.scss
* dev/styles/config/config-local.scss
* dev/styles/config/config-stage.scss
* dev/styles/config/config-prod.scss

###verr√† generato il file javascipt:###
* dev/scripts/config/config.js

##sviluppo locale##

```
#!javascript

npm run dev

```
e collegarsi all'indirizzo http://localhost:8080

##build##

```
#!javascript

npm run dev

```
